00085 typedef struct Gan_Rot3D
00086 {
00088    Gan_Rot3D_Type type;
00089 
00091    union
00092    {
00094       Gan_Quaternion q;
00095 
00097       Gan_Vector3 r;
00098 
00100       struct { Gan_Vector3 axis; double angle; } aa;
00101 
00103       Gan_Matrix33 R;
00104    } data;
00105 } Gan_Rot3D;
